resources.string: This app uses the API from SponsorBlock
Tap to learn more, and see downloads for other platforms at: sponsor.ajay.app
Provided API MIRROR URL is invalid
Are you looking for changing colors?
"You can now change a category's color by clicking on it above."
What to do with different segments
SponsorBlock is a crowd-sourced system for skipping annoying parts in YouTube videos
When SponsorBlock API server is taken down, switch mirror API server to default API server
Switch this on to enable experimental segment adding (has button visibility issues)
Switch this on to enable voting.
This is the number of milliseconds you can move when you use the time adjustment buttons while adding new segment
"The address SponsorBlock uses to make calls to the server. Don't change this unless you know what you're doing."
"Mirror server address to switch to when SponsorBlock server is taken down. Don't change this unless you know what you're doing."
Segments shorter than the set value (in seconds) will not be skipped or shown in the player
This lets SponsorBlock leaderboard system know how much time people have saved. The extension sends a message to the server each time you skip a segment
Show a toast when skipping segment automatically
Click to see an example toast
This time appears in brackets next to the current time. This shows the total video duration minus any segments.
This should be kept private. This is like a password and should not be shared with anyone. If someone has this, they can impersonate you
MicroG does not run in the background

"1. Google device registration and Cloud Messaging need to be enabled for notifications. 2. ReVanced needs to be shown as registered under Cloud Messaging. 3. Current State in Cloud Messaging must be Connected."
"The segment lasts from %02d:%02d to %02d:%02d (%d minutes %02d seconds) Is it ready to submit?"
"You've disabled this category in the settings, enable it to be able to submit"
Do you want to edit the timing for the start or end of the segment?
Mark two locations on the time bar first
Set %02d:%02d:%04d as the start or end of a new segment?
Album cards are shown from search results
Album cards are hidden from search results
Filter components by their name separated by a comma
Official cards are shown from search results
Official cards are hidden from search results
Import ReVanced settings from file or export ReVanced settings to file
Type the hex code of the seekbar color to use in dark mode
is not installed. Please install it.
"Package name of the downloader app such as NewPipe's or PowerTube's"
Disable haptic feedback on long press
Enable custom seekbar color in dark mode
YouTube Layout will follow your Google Account status
Trick the YouTube version to force enable old layout
New style quality settings are shown
Old style quality settings are shown
Tricks the dpi to use some phone layouts
When entering fullscreen after restarting the app, the saved brightness value is not overwritten
When entering fullscreen after restarting the app, the saved brightness value is overwritten
Does not save video quality values even when changing video quality
Save the video quality value whenever you change the video quality
Does not save video speed values even when changing video speed
Save the video speed value whenever you change the video speed
Even if the brightness is set to 0 by swiping, auto brightness is not activated
When brightness reaches 0 by swiping, auto brightness is activated
When playing HDR videos, brightness values specified by YouTube are applied
When playing HDR video, swipe gesture brightness values are applied
Enable swipe gesture brightness values in HDR video
Tricks the dpi to use some tablet layouts
Spoof device information to enable VP9 codec
Save your ReVanced settings to file
Report issues or leave suggestions here
Captions are enabled when playing a video with captioning is enforced
"Captions aren't enabled when playing a video with captioning is enforced"
Auto player popup panels are shown
Auto player popup panels are hidden
Hides the component of the button container
Hides the comments section or component
Listen with YouTube Music menu is shown
Listen with YouTube Music menu is hidden
Hide listen with YouTube Music menu
Stats for nerds menu is shown
Stats for nerds menu is hidden
Watch in VR menu is shown
Watch in VR menu is hidden
Hides Shorts section or the Shorts player component
Shorts player comments button is shown
Shorts player comments button is hidden
Shorts player remix button is shown
Shorts player remix button is hidden
Shorts player join button is shown
Shorts player join button is hidden
Shorts player subscriptions button is shown
Shorts player subscriptions button is hidden
Shorts player thanks button is shown
Shorts player thanks button is hidden
Shorts player is shown at app startup
Shorts player is hidden at app startup
Hide shorts player at app startup
Fetch ReVanced settings from saved file
Tricks the YouTube version to fix an issue that exists on the official YouTube. This trick only works if you do a clean install.
Copy link with timestamp button is hidden
Copy link with timestamp button is shown
Show copy link with timestamp button
Hides the component of the player settings flyout panel
"As this is still an experimental feature, there may be other unknown issues. Are you sure you want to continue though?"

"Tricks the YouTube client version to v17.28.35 to load the old layout
In the app settings, the YouTube version may be marked as v17.28.35"

"Tricks the dpi to change some layouts to phone layouts.
If you enable this setting, the following features are available: - Community Posts - Hide Mix playlist"

"Tricks the dpi to change some layouts to tablet layouts.
If you enable this setting, the following features are not available: - Ambient mode - Community Posts"

"Spoofs device information to enable VP9 codec
Since these setting is quite outdated, it may not be valid"
Dislike data is provided by the Return YouTube Dislike API. Tap here to learn more.
Like button styled for best appearance
Like button styled for minimum width
Dislikes not available (client API limit reached)
Changing default mobile data quality to:
Failed to change default mobile data quality
Failed to change default WI-FI quality
The amount of threshold for swipe to occur
The visibility of swipe overlay background
The text size for swipe overlay
The amount of milliseconds the overlay is visible
Failed to add channel %s to the %s whitelist
Channel %s was added to the %s whitelist
Failed to retrieve channel details, received code %d
Reboot to apply channel whitelist settings
Failed to remove channel %s from the %s whitelist
Channel %s was removed from the %s whitelist
Check or remove the list of channels added to the whitelist
"It's recommended to read the SponsorBlock guidelines before submitting any segment"
Guidelines contain tips and rules about submitting segments
Switching mirror API server to main API server..
Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for spoken conclusions
Tangential scenes added only for filler or humor that are not required to understand the main content of the video. This should not include context or background details
An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, repeating animation
Only for use in music videos. Skips parts of the video not in official mixes
"Recap of previous episodes, or a preview of what's coming up later in the current video or future videos in the same series. Clips should not provide additional information."
When there is unpaid or self promotion. This includes specific sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with
Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements
When there is a short reminder to like, subscribe, follow or interact with them on any free or paid platform
This is your entire configuration that is applicable in the desktop extension in JSON. This includes your Private userID, so be sure to share this wisely.
"That's %s of their lives. Click to see the leaderboard"
"Can't submit the segment. Rate Limited (Too many from the same user or IP)"
"Can't vote for segment. Rate Limited (Too many from the same user or IP)"
